import "./AddAgent.css"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { faTrash, faPencilAlt } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Form, Row, Col, Button, InputGroup, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; import { addNewAgent } from "../../reducers/AgentReducer"; function AddAgent() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { loading } = useSelector(state => state.agent); const [userId, setUserId] = useState(""); const [email1, setEmail1] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const [dob, setDob] = useState(null); const [crmId, setCrmId] = useState(""); const [teleCallingId, setTeleCallingId] = useState(""); const [licenseUrnNo, setLicenseUrnNo] = useState(""); const [licenseIssueDate, setLicenseIssueDate] = useState(null); const [licenseExpiryDate, setLicenseExpiryDate] = useState(null); const handleEditSubmitClicked = () => { if (email1) { let obj = { email: email1, name, address, dob: dob ? dob.valueOf() : null, crmId, teleCallingId, licenseUrnNo, licenseIssueDate: licenseIssueDate ? licenseIssueDate.valueOf() : null, licenseExpiryDate: licenseExpiryDate ? licenseExpiryDate.valueOf() : null, }; console.log(obj); dispatch(addNewAgent(obj)); } }; return (

Add new Agent

Email setEmail1(event.target.value)} placeholder="Enter the email" /> Name setName(event.target.value)} placeholder="Enter the name" /> DOB setDob(new Date(event.target.value))} type="date" /> CRM Id setCrmId(event.target.value)} required type="text" placeholder="Enter the CRM-ID" /> Telecalling ID setTeleCallingId(event.target.value)} required type="text" placeholder="Enter the Telecalling-ID" /> Address setAddress(event.target.value)} required type="text" placeholder="Enter the address" /> License URN no. setLicenseUrnNo(event.target.value)} required type="text" placeholder="Enter the license URN no" /> License Issue Date setLicenseIssueDate(new Date(event.target.value)) } required type="date" placeholder="Enter the license issue date" /> License Expiry Date setLicenseExpiryDate(new Date(event.target.value)) } required type="date" placeholder="Enter the license expiry date" />
); } export default AddAgent;
